Apresentation.about: I am a web developer specialized in front-end and hybrid mobile development. I am {age} years old and passionate about technology.

About.about-apresentation: I am a web and mobile developer specializing in front-end. I am currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology at UFRN. My goal is to create interfaces that provide the best possible user experience. I am always open to learning and improving my skills in different technologies, languages, and frameworks.
